title: CFTC Staff Withdraws Advisory on Swap Execution Facility Registration Requirement
content:
Release Number 9055-25

CFTC Staff Withdraws Advisory on Swap Execution Facility Registration Requirement

March 13, 2025

WASHINGTON, D.C. — The Commodity Futures Trading Commission’s Division of Market Oversight today announced it is withdrawing CFTC Letter No. 21-19, Staff Advisory Swap Execution Facility Registration Requirement, effective immediately. 

As stated in today’s withdrawal letter, DMO determined to withdraw the advisory since it has created uncertainty regarding whether certain entities are required to register as SEFs.

-CFTC-
